title: Crypto Treasury Companies: New Corporate Accumulation Model Emerges
summary: A new class of Crypto Treasury Companies (CTCs) has emerged, accumulating diverse crypto assets (BTC, ETH, SOL, XRP) through equity issuance, convertible bonds, and M&A involving SPACs. US-domiciled entities dominate due to superior capital market liquidity, with success dependent on cash flow management and capital structuring to maintain holdings.
